::Perndabot::

Perndabot easily catches the device, nodding. His mechfluid raced as he 
walked on in the direction of the Cybertronian Fire. Soon, there would be 
Maximal mechfluid on his hands, scrapped Maximals laying around...

He speeds up, passing BrightBlade. "So, what kind of things are you recording 
on the Cybertronian Fire?" he asks, looking back at her.
